column2: A dashboard is in place and updated timely to display the situation and the activities being implemented (1 m)
column3: Project agreements signed by the NS and the IFRC no longer than 7 days from the DREF/EA approval
column4: After PA is signed by both parties, HoD/project manager to process the Request for Payment to be sent to Treasury within 10 days of DREF/ EA approval
column5: Bank transfer process by IFRC to the NS within 24h after the request for payment is received/approved
column6: Confirmation from the NSs of the funds received to be obtained within 3 working days from the value date of the transfer
